sentences.sContent: When our day's work was at an end we hastened there.
sentences.sCn: 当天工作一结束， 我们就急忙赶到那里。

sentences.sContent: From this moment all his care and sorrow was at an end, and the father lived in happiness with his children till his death.
sentences.sCn: 从此刻开始他的所有的悲伤和担心都结束了，于是父亲和他的孩子一直过着幸福的生活直到他去世。

sentences.sContent: "The times are as bad as ever," she said; "we have just half a loaf left, and when that is gone all love will be at an end.
sentences.sCn: “时代和以前一样糟糕，”她说；“我们只剩下半条面包了，当这都吃完了，所有的感情就都结束了。

trans.tranOther: If something is at an end, it has finished and will not continue.
